Name: AddressType
Title: AddressType
Descriptino: The type of an address (physical / postal).

Name: AddressUse
Title: AddressUse
Descriptino: The use of an address.

Name: AdministrativeGender
Title: AdministrativeGender
Descriptino: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

Name: AllLanguages
Title: All Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes all possible codes from BCP-47 (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: SNOMEDCTBodyStructures
Title: SNOMED CT Body Structures
Descriptino: This value set includes all codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 442083009 (Anatomical or acquired body site (body structure)).

Name: BundleType
Title: BundleType
Descriptino: Indicates the purpose of a bundle - how it is intended to be used.

Name: DocumentTypeValueSet
Title: Document Type Value Set
Descriptino: This is the code specifying the precise type of document (e.g. Pulmonary History and  Physical, Discharge Summary, Ultrasound Report, etc.). The Document Type value set includes all LOINC  values listed in HITSP C80 Table 2-144 Document Class Value Set Definition above used for Document Class,  and all LOINC values whose SCALE is DOC in the LOINC database.

Name: FacilityTypeCodeValueSet
Title: Facility Type Code Value Set
Descriptino: This is the code representing the type of organizational setting where the clinical encounter, service, interaction, or treatment occurred. The value set used for Healthcare Facility Type has been defined by HITSP to be the value set reproduced from HITSP C80 Table 2-147.

Name: PracticeSettingCodeValueSet
Title: Practice Setting Code Value Set
Descriptino: This is the code representing the clinical specialty of the clinician or provider who interacted with, treated, or provided a service to/for the patient. The value set used for clinical specialty has been limited by HITSP to the value set reproduced from HITSP C80 Table 2-149 Clinical Specialty Value Set Definition.

Name: SNOMEDCTClinicalFindings
Title: SNOMED CT Clinical Findings
Descriptino: This value set includes all the "Clinical finding" [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) codes - concepts where concept is-a 404684003 (Clinical finding (finding)).

Name: CommonTags
Title: Common Tags
Descriptino: Common Tag Codes defined by FHIR project

Name: CompositionAttestationMode
Title: CompositionAttestationMode
Descriptino: The way in which a person authenticated a composition.

Name: CompositionStatus
Title: CompositionStatus
Descriptino: The workflow/clinical status of the composition.

Name: Condition/Problem/DiagnosisCodes
Title: Condition/Problem/Diagnosis Codes
Descriptino: Example value set for Condition/Problem/Diagnosis codes.

Name: ContactEntityType
Title: Contact entity type
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the purpose for which you would contact a contact party.

Name: DataAbsentReason
Title: DataAbsentReason
Descriptino: Used to specify why the normally expected content of the data element is missing.

Name: DaysOfWeek
Title: DaysOfWeek
Descriptino: The days of the week.

Name: ProcedureDeviceActionCodes
Title: Procedure Device Action Codes
Descriptino: Example codes indicating the change that happened to the device during the procedure.  Note that these are in no way complete and might not even be appropriate for some uses.

Name: FHIRDeviceTypes
Title: FHIR Device Types
Descriptino: Codes used to identify medical devices. Includes concepts from SNOMED CT (http://www.snomed.org/) where concept is-a 49062001 (Device)  and is provided as a suggestive example.

Name: DeviceNameType
Title: DeviceNameType
Descriptino: The type of name the device is referred by.

Name: FHIRDeviceStatus
Title: FHIRDeviceStatus
Descriptino: The availability status of the device.

Name: FHIRDeviceStatusReason
Title: FHIRDeviceStatusReason
Descriptino: The availability status reason of the device.

Name: DiagnosticReportStatus
Title: DiagnosticReportStatus
Descriptino: The status of the diagnostic report.

Name: DiagnosticServiceSectionCodes
Title: Diagnostic Service Section Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all the codes in HL7 V2 table 0074.

Name: DocumentSectionCodes
Title: Document Section Codes
Descriptino: Document section codes (LOINC codes used in CCDA sections).

Name: FHIRDocumentTypeCodes
Title: FHIR Document Type Codes
Descriptino: FHIR Document Codes - all LOINC codes where scale type = 'DOC'.

Name: DocumentClassValueSet
Title: Document Class Value Set
Descriptino: This is the code specifying the high-level kind of document (e.g. Prescription, Discharge Summary, Report, etc.). Note: Class code for documents comes from LOINC, and is based upon one of the following:The type of service described by the document. It is described at a very high level in Section 7.3 of the LOINC Manual. The type study performed. It was determined by identifying modalities for study reports. The section of the chart where the document is placed. It was determined from the SETs created for Claims Attachment requests.

Name: DocumentReferenceStatus
Title: DocumentReferenceStatus
Descriptino: The status of the document reference.

Name: DocumentRelationshipType
Title: DocumentRelationshipType
Descriptino: The type of relationship between documents.

Name: EventStatus
Title: EventStatus
Descriptino: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of an event.

Name: DocumentReferenceFormatCodeSet
Title: DocumentReference Format Code Set
Descriptino: The value set is defined to be the set of format codes defined by the IHE Technical Framework, and also including additional format codes defined by the    HL7. The value set is listed in HITSP C80 Table 2-153 Format Code Value Set Definition,    with additions published later by IHE as published    at http://wiki.ihe.net/index.php?title=IHE_Format_Codes   and with additions published later by HL7 as published at https://confluence.hl7.org/display/SD/Format+Codes+for+IHE+XDS.   This is the code specifying the technical format of the document. Along with the typeCode,    it should provide sufficient information to allow any potential document consumer to know    if it will be able to process the document. The code shall be sufficiently specific to    ensure processing/display by identifying a document encoding, structure and template. The actual list of codes here is incomplete

Name: HTTPVerb
Title: HTTPVerb
Descriptino: HTTP verbs (in the HTTP command line). See [HTTP rfc](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231) for details.

Name: Identifier Type Codes
Title: IdentifierType
Descriptino: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

Name: IdentifierUse
Title: IdentifierUse
Descriptino: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

Name: ImmunizationFunctionCodes
Title: Immunization Function Codes
Descriptino: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the function a practitioner or organization may play in the immunization event. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

Name: ImmunizationFundingSource
Title: Immunization Funding Source
Descriptino: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the source of the vaccine administered. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

Name: ImmunizationOriginCodes
Title: Immunization Origin Codes
Descriptino: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the source of the data when the report of the immunization event is not based on information from the person, entity or organization who administered the vaccine. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

Name: ImmunizationProgramEligibility
Title: Immunization Program Eligibility
Descriptino: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the patient's eligibility for a vaccination program. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

Name: ImmunizationReasonCodes
Title: Immunization Reason Codes
Descriptino: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the reason why a dose of vaccine was administered. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

Name: ImmunizationRecommendationDateCriterionCodes
Title: Immunization Recommendation Date Criterion Codes
Descriptino: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support the definition of dates relevant to recommendations for future doses of vaccines. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

Name: ImmunizationRecommendationReasonCodes
Title: Immunization Recommendation Reason Codes
Descriptino: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the reasons why a given recommendation status is assigned. This value set is provided as a suggestive example and includes SNOMED CT concepts.

Name: ImmunizationRecommendationStatusCodes
Title: Immunization Recommendation Status Codes
Descriptino: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the status of the patient towards perceived immunity against a vaccine preventable disease. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

Name: ImmunizationStatusCodes
Title: Immunization Status Codes
Descriptino: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the current status of the administered dose of vaccine.

Name: ImmunizationStatusReasonCodes
Title: Immunization Status Reason Codes
Descriptino: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the reason why a dose of vaccine was not administered. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

Name: ImmunizationSubpotentReason
Title: Immunization Subpotent Reason
Descriptino: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the reason why a dose is considered to be subpotent. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

Name: Iso3166-1-2
Title: Iso 3166 Part 1: 2 Letter Codes
Descriptino: This value set defines the ISO 3166 Part 1 2-letter codes

Name: Iso3166-1-3
Title: Iso 3166 Part 1: 3 Letter Codes
Descriptino: This value set defines the ISO 3166 Part 1 3-letter codes

Name: QuestionnaireItemType
Title: QuestionnaireItemType
Descriptino: Distinguishes groups from questions and display text and indicates data type for questions.

Name: Jurisdiction ValueSet
Title: Jurisdiction
Descriptino: This value set defines a base set of codes for country, country subdivision and region    for indicating where a resource is intended to be used.             Note: The codes for countries and country subdivisions are taken from    [ISO 3166](https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html)    while the codes for "supra-national" regions are from    [UN Standard country or area codes for statistical use (M49)](http://unstats.un.org/unsd/methods/m49/m49.htm).

Name: CommonLanguages
Title: Common Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: LinkType
Title: LinkType
Descriptino: The type of link between this patient resource and another patient resource.

Name: ListEmptyReasons
Title: List Empty Reasons
Descriptino: General reasons for a list to be empty. Reasons are either related to a summary list (i.e. problem or medication list) or to a workflow related list (i.e. consultation list).

Name: PatientMedicineChangeTypes
Title: Patient Medicine Change Types
Descriptino: Example Item Flags for the List Resource. In this case, these are the kind of flags that would be used on a medication list at the end of a consultation.

Name: ListMode
Title: ListMode
Descriptino: The processing mode that applies to this list.

Name: ListOrderCodes
Title: List Order Codes
Descriptino: Base values for the order of the items in a list resource.

Name: ListStatus
Title: ListStatus
Descriptino: The current state of the list.

Name: Marital Status Codes
Title: MaritalStatus
Descriptino: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the marital status of a person.

Name: Mime Types
Title: MimeType
Descriptino: This value set includes all possible codes from BCP-13 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp13)

Name: NameUse
Title: NameUse
Descriptino: The use of a human name.

Name: ObservationCategoryCodes
Title: Observation Category Codes
Descriptino: Observation Category codes.

Name: LOINCCodes
Title: LOINC Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all LOINC codes

Name: ObservationInterpretationCodes
Title: Observation Interpretation Codes
Descriptino: A categorical assessment, providing a rough qualitative interpretation of the observation value,    such as “normal”/ “abnormal”,”low” / “high”, “better” / “worse”, “susceptible” / “resistant”, “expected”/ “not expected”.    The value set is intended to be for ANY use where coded representation of an interpretation is needed.             Notes:          This is being communicated in v2.x in OBX-8 (Observation Interpretation), in v3 in ObservationInterpretation (CWE) in R1 (Representative Realm) and in FHIR in    Observation.interpretation. Historically these values come from the laboratory domain, and these codes are extensively    used. The value set binding is extensible, so codes outside the value set that are needed for interpretation concepts    (i.e. particular meanings) that are not included in the value set can be used, and these new codes may also be added to    the value set and published in a future version.

Name: ObservationStatus
Title: ObservationStatus
Descriptino: Codes providing the status of an observation.

Name: OrganizationType
Title: Organization type
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate a type of organization.

Name: ProcedurePerformerRoleCodes
Title: Procedure Performer Role Codes
Descriptino: This example value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate a role of a procedure performer.

Name: PractitionerRole
Title: Practitioner role
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the role of a Practitioner.

Name: ProcedureCategoryCodes(SNOMEDCT)
Title: Procedure Category Codes (SNOMED CT)
Descriptino: Procedure Category code: A selection of relevant SNOMED CT codes.

Name: ProcedureFollowUpCodes(SNOMEDCT)
Title: Procedure Follow up Codes (SNOMED CT)
Descriptino: Procedure follow up codes: A selection of SNOMED CT codes relevant to procedure follow up.

Name: ProcedureNotPerformedReason(SNOMED-CT)
Title: Procedure Not Performed Reason (SNOMED-CT)
Descriptino: Situation codes describing the reason that a procedure, which might otherwise be expected, was not performed, or a procedure that was started and was not completed. Consists of SNOMED CT codes, children of procedure contraindicated (183932001), procedure discontinued (416406003), procedure not done (416237000), procedure not indicated (428119001), procedure not offered (416064006), procedure not wanted (416432009), procedure refused (183944003), and procedure stopped (394908001).

Name: ProcedureOutcomeCodes(SNOMEDCT)
Title: Procedure Outcome Codes (SNOMED CT)
Descriptino: Procedure Outcome code: A selection of relevant SNOMED CT codes.

Name: ProcedureReasonCodes
Title: Procedure Reason Codes
Descriptino: This example value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate a reason for a procedure.

Name: PublicationStatus
Title: PublicationStatus
Descriptino: The lifecycle status of an artifact.

Name: QuestionnaireAnswerCodes
Title: Questionnaire Answer Codes
Descriptino: Example list of codes for answers to questions. (Not complete or necessarily appropriate.)

Name: QuestionnaireResponseStatus
Title: QuestionnaireResponseStatus
Descriptino: Lifecycle status of the questionnaire response.

Name: EnableWhenBehavior
Title: EnableWhenBehavior
Descriptino: Controls how multiple enableWhen values are interpreted -  whether all or any must be true.

Name: QuestionnaireItemOperator
Title: QuestionnaireItemOperator
Descriptino: The criteria by which a question is enabled.

Name: QuestionnaireQuestionCodes
Title: Questionnaire Question Codes
Descriptino: Example list of codes for questions and groups of questions. (Not necessarily complete or appropriate.)

Name: ObservationReferenceRangeAppliesToCodes
Title: Observation Reference Range Applies To Codes
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the particular target population the reference range applies to.

Name: ObservationReferenceRangeMeaningCodes
Title: Observation Reference Range Meaning Codes
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the meaning/use of a reference range for a particular target population.

Name: ResourceType
Title: Resource Types
Descriptino: Concrete FHIR Resource Types

Name: ResourceType
Title: ResourceType
Descriptino: One of the resource types defined as part of this version of FHIR.

Name: SearchEntryMode
Title: SearchEntryMode
Descriptino: Why an entry is in the result set - whether it's included as a match or because of an _include requirement, or to convey information or warning information about the search process.

Name: All Security Labels
Title: SecurityLabels
Descriptino: A single value set for all security labels defined by FHIR.

Name: FHIRSpecimenCollectionMethod
Title: FHIR Specimen Collection Method
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the method by which a specimen was collected.

Name: SpecimenContainerType
Title: Specimen Container Type
Descriptino: Checks on the patient prior specimen collection. All SNOMED CT concepts descendants of 706041008 |Device for body fluid and tissue collection/transfer/processing (physical object)|

Name: SpecimenProcessingProcedure
Title: Specimen processing procedure
Descriptino: The technique that is used to perform the process or preserve the specimen.

Name: SpecimenStatus
Title: SpecimenStatus
Descriptino: Codes providing the status/availability of a specimen.

Name: UDIEntryType
Title: UDIEntryType
Descriptino: Codes to identify how UDI data was entered.

Name: VaccineAdministeredValueSet
Title: Vaccine Administered Value Set
Descriptino: This identifies the vaccine substance administered - CVX codes.

Name: AbsentOrUnknownImmunizationUvIps
Title: Absent or Unknown Immunization - IPS
Descriptino: Absent or Unknown Immunization

Name: BodySiteUvIps
Title: Body Site - IPS
Descriptino: IPS body site value set. This value set includes a set of codes from SNOMED CT that may be used to represent body sites (e.g., for laboratory specimen collection).

Name: MedicineRouteOfAdministrationUvIps
Title: Medicine Route of Administration - IPS
Descriptino: EDQM (European Directorate for the Quality of Medicines and Healthcare) Route of Administration codes.  This Value Set includes all the EDQM Standard Terms having:   [Concept Status] = ‘Current’ AND   [Concept Class] = 'ROA' AND   [Domain] = 'Human and Veterinary'    ROA = 'Route of administration'

Name: PersonalRelationshipUvIps
Title: Personal Relationship - IPS [Deprecated]
Descriptino: The Value Set is used (optionally) to code the type of contact relationship between a person and the patient. This value set has been deprecated and will be removed in a future release.  It has been replaced with [PersonalRelationshipRoleType](https://terminology.hl7.org/3.1.0/ValueSet-v3-PersonalRelationshipRoleType.html)

Name: ProceduresSnomedAbsentUnknownUvIps
Title: Procedures - SNOMED CT + Absent/Unknown - IPS
Descriptino: This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms®: descendants of 71388002 \|Procedure (procedure)\|, excluding [all subtypes of 14734007 \|Administrative procedure (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 59524001 \|Blood bank procedure (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 389067005 \|Community health procedure (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 442006003 \|Determination of information related to transfusion (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 225288009 \|Environmental care procedure (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 308335008 \|Patient encounter procedure (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 710135002 \|Promotion (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 389084004 \|Staff related procedure (procedure)\|], plus IPS codes for absent/unknown procedures.

Name: ResultsCodedValuesLaboratoryUvIps
Title: Results Coded Values Laboratory - IPS
Descriptino: This value set is defined as the union of: (a) Blood group [Type]; (b) Presence/Absence Indicators (2.16.840.1.113883.11.22.52) (c) Microorganisms (2.16.840.1.113883.11.22.49)

Name: ResultsLaboratoryObservationUvIps
Title: Results Laboratory Observation - IPS
Descriptino: Value Set Definition: LOINC {STATUS in {ACTIVE}, CLASSTYPE in {1}, CLASS exclude {CHALSKIN, H&P.HX.LAB, LABORDERS, NR STATS, PATH, PATH.\*, MOLPATH, MOLPATH.\*, CYTO, HL7.CYTOGEN, HL7.GENETICS}}

Name: TargetSiteUvIps
Title: Target Site - IPS
Descriptino: This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms®: all descendants of 442083009 | Anatomical or acquired body structure (body structure)|.

Name: VaccineTargetDiseasesUvIpsDeprecated
Title: Vaccine Target Diseases - IPS [Deprecated]
Descriptino: This value set includes the codes from SNOMED CT describing Vaccine Target Diseases. To follow a consistent value set naming pattern, this value set has been deprecated and will be removed in a future release.  It has been replaced with [target-diseases-uv-ips](./ValueSet-target-diseases-uv-ips.html)

Name: VaccinesUvIps
Title: Vaccines - IPS
Descriptino: This value set provides a list of types of vaccine, plus IPS codes for absent/unknown immunizations. It includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms®: all descendants of 787859002 \|Vaccine product (product)\|.

Name: WhoAtcUvIps
Title: WHO ATC - IPS
Descriptino: World Health Organization Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) classification system.  Note: The currently implemented code system and the value set expansion contain only a set of example ATC codes, not the complete code system content.

Name: IHE_FormatCode_vs
Title: IHE ValueSet of Format Codes for use with Document Sharing
Descriptino: The IHE FormatCode Value set is defined to be the set of FormatCode(s) defined by IHE, DICOM and HL7. These codes are intended to be preferred.

Name: DDCC_Composition_Category_ValueSet
Title: DDCC Composition Category Codes
Descriptino: Categorization of DDCC Composition

Name: DDCC_Device_Property_ValueSet
Title: DDCC Device Property Codes
Descriptino: Properties of DDCC devices

Name: DDCC_Folder_DesignationType_ValueSet
Title: DDCC DesignationTypes for Folder
Descriptino: DDCC Designation Types ValueSet for DDCC Folders.

Name: DDCC_QR_Format_ValueSet
Title: DDCC QR Format Codes
Descriptino: Format of the representation of QR code

Name: DDCC_QR_Type_ValueSet
Title: DDCC QR Type Codes
Descriptino: Type of QR codes by their business usage

Name: DIVOC_ValueSet
Title: COVID-19 Vaccine Codes for DIVOC
Descriptino: COVID-19 Vaccine codes for DIVOC so the FHIR server can perform expansions.

Name: ICAOV1_ValueSet
Title: DDCC Codes for ICAO Vaccines
Descriptino: ICAO vaccines codes for DDCC so the FHIR server can perform expansions.

Name: LabTestPathogenCovid19SnomedValueSet
Title: Lab Test - Pathogen - COVID-19 - SNOMED CT
Descriptino: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed values for pathogens in EUDCC, retrieved in February 2023 from https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=uriserv%3AOJ.L_.2021.230.01.0032.01.ENG. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the credential's documentation.

Name: LabTestPathogenDivocValueSet
Title: Lab Test - Pathogen - DIVOC
Descriptino: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed values for pathogens, retrieved in February 2023. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the credential's documentation. Some information on DIVOC's test certificate can be found at https://github.com/egovernments/DIVOC/blob/main/test-certificate-context/test-certificate-context.js. Additional information on DIVOC can be found at <https://divoc.digit.org/platform/divocs-verifiable-certificate-features>

Name: LabTestQualitativeResultDivocValueSet
Title: Lab Test - Qualitative Result - DIVOC
Descriptino: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed values for lab test results, retrieved in February 2023. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the credential's documentation. Some information on DIVOC's test certificate can be found at https://github.com/egovernments/DIVOC/blob/main/test-certificate-context/test-certificate-context.js. Additional information on DIVOC can be found at <https://divoc.digit.org/platform/divocs-verifiable-certificate-features>

Name: LabTestResultIcaoValueSet
Title: Lab Test - Qualitative Result - ICAO
Descriptino: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed values for lab test results in ICAO, retrieved in February 2023 from https://www.icao.int/Security/FAL/TRIP/PublishingImages/Pages/Publications/Visible%20Digital%20Seal%20for%20non-constrained%20environments%20%28VDS-NC%29.pdf. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the credential's documentation.

Name: LabTestQualitativeResultSnomedValueSet
Title: Lab Test - Qualitative Result - SNOMED CT
Descriptino: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed values for lab test results in EUDCC and SMART Health Cards, retrieved in February 2023 from https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=uriserv%3AOJ.L_.2021.230.01.0032.01.ENG and <http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-shc-vaccination-ig/ValueSet-vaccine-snomed.html> respectively. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the original documentation.

Name: LabTestSampleOriginDivocValueSet
Title: Lab Test - Sample Origin - DIVOC
Descriptino: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed values for lab test sample origins, retrieved in February 2023. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the credential's documentation. Some information on DIVOC's test certificate is at https://github.com/egovernments/DIVOC/blob/main/test-certificate-context/test-certificate-context.js. Additional information on DIVOC can be found at <https://divoc.digit.org/platform/divocs-verifiable-certificate-features>

Name: LabTestSampleOriginIcaoValueSet
Title: Lab Test - Sample Origin - ICAO
Descriptino: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed values for lab test sample origins in ICAO, retrieved in February 2023 from https://www.icao.int/Security/FAL/TRIP/PublishingImages/Pages/Publications/Visible%20Digital%20Seal%20for%20non-constrained%20environments%20%28VDS-NC%29.pdf. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the credential's documentation.

Title: Lab Test - Type - COVID-19 - LOINC
Descriptino: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed values for COVID-19 specific lab tests in EUDCC, retrieved in February 2023 from https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=uriserv%3AOJ.L_.2021.230.01.0032.01.ENG. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the credential's documentation.

Name: LabTestTypeDivocValueSet
Title: Lab Test - Type - DIVOC
Descriptino: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed values for lab test types, retrieved in February 2023. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the credential's documentation. Some information on DIVOC's test certificate can be found at https://github.com/egovernments/DIVOC/blob/main/test-certificate-context/test-certificate-context.js. Additional information on DIVOC can be found at <https://divoc.digit.org/platform/divocs-verifiable-certificate-features>

Name: LabTestTypeIcaoValueSet
Title: Lab Test - Type - ICAO
Descriptino: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed values for lab test types in ICAO, retrieved in February 2023 from https://www.icao.int/Security/FAL/TRIP/PublishingImages/Pages/Publications/Visible%20Digital%20Seal%20for%20non-constrained%20environments%20%28VDS-NC%29.pdf. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the credential's documentation.

Name: LabTestTypeLoincValueSet
Title: Lab Test - Type - Generic - LOINC
Descriptino: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed values for generic lab tests in EUDCC, retrieved in February 2023 from https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=uriserv%3AOJ.L_.2021.230.01.0032.01.ENG. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the credential's documentation.

Name: VaccineCovid19CvxValueSet
Title: Vaccine - COVID-19 - CVX
Descriptino: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed CVX codes for vaccines, retrieved in February 2023. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the credential documentation, found here http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/shc-vaccination/2021Sep/ValueSet-vaccine-cvx.html. More information on the CVX value set can be found here, <https://www2a.cdc.gov/vaccines/iis/iisstandards/vaccines.asp?rpt=cvx>

Name: VaccineCovid19EUUnionRegisterValueSet
Title: Vaccine - COVID-19 - EU Union Register of Medicinial Products
Descriptino: Union Register of medicinal products for vaccines with EU-wide authorisation. The Union Register is found at <https://ec.europa.eu/health/documents/community-register/html/index_en.htm>. However, the contents of this ValueSet are based on v1.14 (2023-01-25) of the [EU DCC value set guidelines](https://health.ec.europa.eu/system/files/2023-01/eu-dcc-value-sets_en.pdf).

Name: VaccineCovid19Icd11ValueSet
Title: Vaccine - COVID-19 - Icd11
Descriptino: tbd

Name: VaccineCovid19SnomedValueSet
Title: Vaccine - COVID-19 - SNOMED CT

Name: Hl7VSAdditivePreservative
Title: hl7VS-additivePreservative
Descriptino: Concepts specifying any additive introduced to the specimen before or at the time of collection.  These additives may be introduced in order to preserve, maintain or enhance the particular nature or component of the specimen.  Used in Version 2 messaging in the SPM segment.

Name: Hl7VSSpecimenCondition
Title: hl7VS-specimenCondition
Descriptino: Concepts of modes or states of being that describe the nature of a specimen.  Used in Version 2 messaging in the SPM segment.

Name: Hl7VSRelevantClincialInformation
Title: hl7VS-relevantClincialInformation
Descriptino: Value Set of codes that specify additional clinical information about the patient or specimen to report the supporting and/or suspected diagnosis and clinical findings on requests for interpreted diagnostic studies.

Name: v2.0360.2.7
Title: v2 table 0360
Descriptino: Version 2.7
Uses: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0360 ver 2.9 ( Degree/License/Certificate)

Name: ActCode
Title: v3 Code System ActCode
Descriptino: A code specifying the particular kind of Act that the Act-instance represents within its class.  Constraints:  The kind of Act (e.g. physical examination, serum potassium, inpatient encounter, charge financial transaction, etc.) is specified with a code from one of several, typically external, coding systems.  The coding system will depend on the class of Act, such as LOINC for observations, etc. Conceptually, the Act.code must be a specialization of the Act.classCode. This is why the structure of ActClass domain should be reflected in the superstructure of the ActCode domain and then individual codes or externally referenced vocabularies subordinated under these domains that reflect the ActClass structure. Act.classCode and Act.code are not modifiers of each other but the Act.code concept should really imply the Act.classCode concept. For a negative example, it is not appropriate to use an Act.code "potassium" together with and Act.classCode for "laboratory observation" to somehow mean "potassium laboratory observation" and then use the same Act.code for "potassium" together with Act.classCode for "medication" to mean "substitution of potassium". This mutually modifying use of Act.code and Act.classCode is not permitted.

Name: v3.ConfidentialityClassification
Title: V3 Value SetConfidentialityClassification
Descriptino: Set of codes used to value Act.Confidentiality and Role.Confidentiality attribute in accordance with the definition for concept domain "Confidentiality".

Name: DocumentReferenceStats
Title: MHD DocumentReference status codes
Descriptino: ValueSet that does not include entered-in-error as that does not map

Name: MHDlistTypesVS
Title: MHD List Types ValueSet
Descriptino: ValueSet of the MHD List Types allowed

Name: MHDprovideFolderActions
Title: MHD Folder List Types ValueSet
Descriptino: A ValueSet of the allowed actions in a ITI-65 Provide Document Bundle for the Folder List type Resources. Where Folders are allowed to be Updated in addition to Created.

Name: MHDprovidePatientActions
Title: MHD Patient Types ValueSet
Descriptino: A ValueSet of the allowed actions in a ITI-65 Provide Document Bundle for the Patient type Resource. Where Patient would typically be indicated as a GET (read), but might be created or updated depending on policy.
